title: Add support for ARM64 Linux toolchain
description: Add ARM64 (aarch64-linux-gnu) as a supported target triple to enable cross-compilation for ARM64 Linux systems. This will allow users to build binaries for ARM servers, Raspberry Pi, and other ARM-based platforms.

title: Verify beads setup is working
description: Test issue to verify that beads is correctly initialized and the daemon is auto-committing to the beads-metadata branch
